code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UpdateWorkflowPage=()=>{const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const[success,setSuccess]=useState(false);const[userData,setUserData]=useState({user:'',Category:'',Sub_Category:'',Workflow_Steps:'',Issue_Type:''});const[workflowId,setWorkflowId]=useState('');const handleInputChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setUserData(prevData=>({...prevData,[name]:value}));};const handleUpdate=async()=>{setLoading(true);setError(null);try{const response=await fetch("http://localhost:3000/Workflow/getWorkflowById/".concat(workflowId),{method:'PUT',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Accept':'application/json'},credentials:'include',body:JSON.stringify(userData)});if(!response.ok){throw new Error("HTTP error! Status: ".concat(response.status));}const updatedWorkflow=await response.json();setSuccess(true);console.log('Updated Workflow:',updatedWorkflow);}catch(error){console.error('Error updating workflow:',error);setError(error.message);}finally{setLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Update Workflow Page"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Enter Workflow ID:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:workflowId,onChange:e=>setWorkflowId(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["User:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"user",value:userData.user,onChange:handleInputChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Category:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"Category",value:userData.Category,onChange:handleInputChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Sub Category:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"Sub_Category",value:userData.Sub_Category,onChange:handleInputChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Workflow Steps:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"Workflow_Steps",value:userData.Workflow_Steps,onChange:handleInputChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Issue Type:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"Issue_Type",value:userData.Issue_Type,onChange:handleInputChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleUpdate,disabled:loading,children:"Update Workflow"}),loading&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Error: ",error]}),success&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Workflow updated successfully!"})]});};export default UpdateWorkflowPage;
